question.body: Which of the following is the largest division of the liver?

response.feedback: Incorrect. Hepatocytes are the smallest division. These are individual cells.
Incorrect. The liver sinusoids bring blood to the hepatocytes.
Incorrect. Liver lobules are a histological division of the liver that includes the functional aspect of the liver.
Correct. The liver lobe is the largest division. The liver is divided into four lobes based on surface features.
